items.name: Aneka Sewa (Kendaraan & Alat Wisata)
items.desc: Jasa sewa motor, mobil, kamera, serta alat snorkeling & diving.
items.descEn: Rental services for motorbikes, cars, cameras, and snorkeling/diving gear.
items.note: Harga bervariasi tergantung musim dan durasi sewa.
items.noteEn: Prices vary by season and rental duration.

items.name: Jasa Pemandu Wisata
items.desc: Pemandu lokal untuk pendampingan trip, penjelasan budaya, dan rute destinasi.
items.descEn: Local guides for trip assistance, cultural insights, and destination routing.
items.note: Disarankan untuk kunjungan pertama agar rute lebih efektif.
items.noteEn: Recommended for first visits so routes are more efficient.

items.name: Spa & Massage
items.desc: Spa tradisional Bali dan pijat refleksi untuk relaksasi setelah perjalanan.
items.descEn: Traditional Balinese spa and reflexology massage to unwind after travel.
items.note: Reservasi dianjurkan, terutama saat musim ramai.
items.noteEn: Reservations recommended, especially during peak season.

items.name: Jasa Dokumentasi (Foto & Video)
items.desc: Fotografer/videografer untuk liburan, prewedding, dan konten media sosial (termasuk drone jika tersedia).
items.descEn: Photographer/videographer for holidays, preweddings, and social media content (drone if available).
items.note: Paket dan harga tergantung durasi, lokasi, dan deliverables.
items.noteEn: Packages and pricing depend on duration, location, and deliverables.

items.name: Penyewaan Peralatan Selam & Snorkeling
items.desc: Penyedia alat snorkeling & diving, bisa termasuk instruktur/pemandu laut.
items.descEn: Snorkeling and diving gear provider, may include instructor/sea guide.
items.note: Perhatikan kondisi cuaca dan arus laut; ikuti arahan pemandu.
items.noteEn: Check weather and currents; follow the guide's instructions.
